name: Random Guardian
description:
A New PvE Tower Defense Game!

Wipe out all enemies, defend your castle！Timely and decisive decision will help you to defeat enemies, for the never-ending waves of enemies will never give up. And remember, once you die... the only way is to start all again! So be careful!

KEY FEATURES
●Random heroes and positions will help you to be invincible on the battlefield.
●Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones.
●Build and upgrade your card collection with a dozen your favorite troops, spells and defenses.
